about_info1: The company S K Fenster & Bautechnik Natalia Stachnik deals with the assembly of the finishing assortment, in particular PVC, aluminum and wooden windows, as well as internal and external doors, window sills, roller shutters and garage doors. Many years of experience in the industry have allowed us to build partnerships with leading window manufacturers.
about_info2: Thanks to our own fleet of vehicles, we are able to provide transport services, safely delivering windows to your home throughout the European Union.
about_info3: We cordially invite you to take advantage of our offer!
